name: Playwright Tests

on:
  push:
    branches: [ main ]
  pull_request:

jobs:
  test:
    runs-on: [self-hosted, linux]
    timeout-minutes: 30

    permissions:
      contents: read
      id-token: write

    defaults:
      run:
        working-directory: playwright

    steps:
      - name: Checkout
        uses: actions/checkout@v4

      - name: Setup Node
        uses: AD/txp-ghac/.github/actions/setup-node@main
        with:
          node-version: 20
          npmrc: ${{ secrets.NPMRC }}

      - name: Setup Chromium (internal)
        uses: AD/dxp-ghac/.github/actions/setup-chromium@main
        with:
          version: latest

      # Important: Tell Playwright not to expect downloaded browsers
      - name: Use system chromium
        run: echo "PLAYWRIGHT_BROWSERS_PATH=0" >> $GITHUB_ENV

      # Important: point Playwright to the chromium binary installed by the action
      - name: Set Chromium path
        run: echo "CHROMIUM_PATH=${{ runner.tool_cache }}/chrome-linux/chrome" >> $GITHUB_ENV

      - name: Verify Chromium
        run: |
          ls -la "${{ runner.tool_cache }}/chrome-linux" || true
          "${{ runner.tool_cache }}/chrome-linux/chrome" --version

      - name: Install dependencies
        run: npm ci

      - name: Run tests
        run: npx playwright test

      - name: Upload Playwright report
        if: always()
        uses: actions/upload-artifact@v4
        with:
          name: playwright-report
          path: playwright/playwright-report
          retention-days: 7
